author: Joseph Akhavan
description: Bittersweet and boozy with a dry finish. Striking the right degree of dilution is key to the success of this cocktail â€“ stir a little longer than usual and if using ice straight from the freezer perhaps consider adding a dash of chilled water.
name: The Italian Job Cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all the ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
